title: Blossom Cascade Stud Earrings with Multi-Colored Gemstones
materials: High-quality Alloy base metal adorned with sparkling simulated Diamonds
complemented by various colored simulated gemstones. Total weight is approximately 19.810 grams.
features: These stud earrings feature a delicate floral design. The upper portion is crafted with an intricate leaf-like pattern, flowing into a central floral cluster. The gemstones are set in a prong setting, allowing maximum light reflection. A mix of round cut gemstones add a touch of whimsical charm.
colors: Predominantly white (simulated diamonds) accented with a pastel palette of pink
creating a soft and feminine aesthetic.
occasions: Perfect for adding a subtle sparkle to daily wear or enhancing your outfit for a special occasion. Ideal for casual gatherings
description: These earrings effortlessly blend traditional elegance with contemporary design. The use of multi-colored gemstones evokes a sense of vibrancy, while the floral motif symbolizes beauty and renewal. A lightweight construction ensures comfortable wear all day long.
